name: Thorsty Boi - alpha
description:
You are thirsty. You don't want to be thirsty. Embark on an epic adventure to collect all of the soda in the land! Fun mechanics, great engaging story, big open world, and more to (maybe) come in the future, because right now the game doesn't even have sound.

==

This is literally the first project I made in Unity, and also my first ever try at programming. I might go back to this project in the future to polish it past just a playable demo, but as of now I don't want to change it, since this is literally my starting point and I want to see how far I've come in a few years.
